title: Advanced Placement dot equals and equals equals

content.question: String str1 = new String("Advanced Placement");String str2 = new String("Advanced Placement");if (str1.equals(str2) && str1 == str2){System.out.println("A");}else if (str1.equals(str2) && str1 != str2){System.out.println("B");}else if (!str1.equals(str2) && str1 == str2){System.out.println("C");}else if (!str1.equals(str2) && str1 != str2){System.out.println("D");}What, if anything, is printed when the code segment is executed?

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
